head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WILSHUSEN, AGNES RUSS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WILSHUSEN, AGNES RUSS

block.p: WILSHUSEN-Agnes Russ. She was 89. Died August 12, 2000, in Troy, NY. Widow of William Wilshusen; sister of Helen Blaschke, Lillian Johnson Pamentel, and Louis Russ; sister-in-law of Otto Blaschke, Anne Russ, John Blaschke, Joyce Diwan, Betty McDonald, John Johnson; and grandnieces and nephews Devin, Molly, Alex, Ann, John. Longtime Flushing resident; retired from General Motors; volunteer at Flushing Hospital and Queens Botanical Garden; member of Redeemer Lutheran Church, Bayside. In lieu of flowers, please donate in her name to Queens Botanical Garden or Redeemer Lutheran Church. Reposing at Howard L. Hallet, Inc. (Gleason Building), 149-20 Northern Blvd, Flushing, Tuesday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Services 8 PM, Tuesday, and 9:30 AM, Wednesday. Interment Cypress Hills Cemetery.
